column4: Does anybody know what I can use to remotely access an Ubuntu computer, something like the Remote Desktop connection functionality of Windows?
VNC won't do, because I need to be logged in on the remote computer in order to use it
X doesnt tha tnativley i think
I would think other people would like to do the same thing
i dont know how, i just know that it is possible
I just the search you suggested and a few results came up
ive a friend on another server that knows how . . .
perhaps you could hok up with him
and the name of your friend?
irc.afternet.org #linux, ask for Rubin, and be patient ;)
